item.title: SQM QoS OpenWrt OpenMPTCProuter
item.description: Doing QoS with OpenMPTCProuter I’m at the countryside so no fiber/FTTH but only FTTD (Fiber To The DSLAM)… Being a remote worker I need a quite stable connection, so I’m currently using 3 ADSL connections aggregated via OpenMPTCProuter. Thus not only if one link fail it will be transparent but the upload and download links are aggregated, it’s not only a failover on the links. Initially I was an OverTheBox user, but that’s another story…
